overview:
Jonathan Chadwick is Skypeâ€™s Chief Financial Officer. He oversees Skypeâ€™s financial organization, its systems and its ability to influence all critical aspects of our business.

Jonathan joined Skype from McAfee, where he was the Executive Vice President and Chief Financial Officer. Prior to McAfee, Jonathan spent 13 years in various finance roles at Cisco Systems. He oversaw Ciscoâ€™s finance teams for the service provider, enterprise, commercial, small business, and consumer customer segments. In addition, he headed teams that lead business architecture planning and new business model introduction across Cisco.

Jonathan is a Chartered Accountant in England and holds an honors degree in electrical and electronic engineering from the University of Bath, UK.
